title: オールカマーの後に・勝って、爆走

text_block_list.text: Matikanetannhauser wins brilliantly against Twin Turbo!
Today's Twin Turbo was amazing, she conveyed a strong will to win, as she says——
Twin Turbo is seen running off in tears, in the opposite direction of the way back to the academy...!
After some ups and downs, they safely catch Twin Turbo, and the two head home together happily.
